attributes.action: demand ONCE AGAIN following the deeply offensive and depraved actions of a Nu_Labour Minister, namely Ed Balls, that Mr McBroon, unelected leader of the Scottish Cabinet in exile in London, change the law to ensure that ANYBODY - in this case Ed Balls - found to be guilty of interfering with the official record of the House of Commons receive an automatic, mandatory, life means life sentence of imprisonment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nu-Labour are playing with the democracy of this country and need to be stopped, and stopped NOW.  The people of this fast draining democracy need to be given an opportunity to voice an opinion on the machinations and falsifications of the official record being manipulated by fraudsters like Ed Balls.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
